name: Simulator Crash Sport Car 3D
description:
Simulator Crash Sport Car
Break Simulation Sports Car - a game application where you can joke to break the car!
Car broke down completely! The finger can be broken down sports car! Break all the cars! You can choose different car crash test! Sports cars are all very beautiful!
Play your friends, while car and how you can be easily disassembled finger!
Break, break, destroy and kill, this is all you can do yourself with a sports car in our game! And you do not have one, do not punish! Give the child, albeit better not break this toy!
The app does not bear any harm and is only for fun! Gently press the screen so that it does not hurt!
Thank you for playing with us leave us your feedback and we try to make our games even more interesting!
